## Tutorials
 
 - Collection of [R Tutorials](http://www.cyclismo.org/tutorial/R/) by Kelly Black from Clarkson Univeristy. Approximately covers an intro to stats undergrad course. 
 
## Data cleaning 

  -  [Introduction to data cleaning in R](http://cran.r-project.org/doc/contrib/de_Jonge+van_der_Loo-Introduction_to_data_cleaning_with_R.pdf), a pdf book from cran.r-project.org

## Presentation in R

RStudio provides a native format for creating presentations - **.Rpres**, availible in the "New file" option. For a quick start with .Rpres see this [article](https://support.rstudio.com/hc/en-us/articles/200486468-Authoring-R-Presentations)
